title: 380: Marriage Struggles
itunes:title: 380: Marriage Struggles
description:
Well this episode got intense and real…The Broads are back and they chat why Jess is coming in hot today, an IRL Rihanna interaction story, celebrity interactions, Bekah’s encounter, life updates, longterm partnership and parent dynamics and struggles, get updates from the #broadsquad’s relationship questions, receive a new breakup #broadsquad question, and much more!
